website_summaries.verdict: This wide, fully transparent design works with larger fonts and won't block charts or illustrations on the page.
pros: Features reading line to help reader align text
Wider than many other options to allow visibility for larger text or illustrations
You don't need to move the strip between lines
cons: The matte finish reduces glare but does not help clarify text

customer_reviews.title: These were successful!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher, and I was looking for something I could use daily for my diagnosed dyslexic students to help them read. This summer, I have been tutoring and broke out the colored rulers I purchased. They worked so well! I was surprised at how successful they were, and now I can’t wait to share them with my fellow teachers. The darker colors had more success than the lighter ones, but I can’t wait for school to start next week so that I can really get some use out of them! What an excellent tool to encourage learning and the love of reading!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great for textbooks and speed reading.
customer_reviews.text: I've always had trouble skimming books and retaining the necessary information, often having to go back and re-read bits. These have helped immensely. It takes a little bit to get used to using them, but once you do you can start to work on increasing your reading speed by moving the ruler down the page a bit faster, "forcing" your eyes to follow it. I've been reading a lot more since getting these. The different colors don't seem to make a difference for me, but it's nice to have multiple to leave in different books as bookmarks. Don't forget to take off the protective coating, they're murky otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great reading tool.,
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter has been identified as a struggling reader. She sees a reading specialist at her school 3 times per week. I work with her every morning before school. Since purchasing these reading rulers, her fluency has improved, and her self-confidence has definitely improved. We tried all the colors. Those in the blue family appear to be the most beneficial. She keeps one in her pencil case so she can use it at school. We are both very pleased with its apparent benefits. She is now beginning to enjoy reading again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lofaso

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally had purchased this tool for my niece, but after seeing how effective it was for her, I snuck one of them to work. The colors are super cute, the tool is flexible, and very thin so it does not take up much space. Working in an office, my eyes do tend to cross from how much I stare at papers and a computer. These rulers made it easy for me to keep on track while never losing my spot while reading. Not only do I recommend this product for those of you who rely on your eyes for work, I also recommend this tool for all ages, and for individuals who wear prescription glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Good for contrast sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son after I figured out he has contrast sensitivity (which explains why he prefers comic books or other books with short blurbs of text on colored backgrounds). We looked at several different tinted sheets/strips before deciding on these rulers. We liked that none of the lines of text would be blocked out but that there was a line to help with tracking. My son is 10 and has struggled with reading for years despite not having any known disability and testing as having great comprehension. Apparently it was just painful for him. He says they help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Former skeptic turned beliver
customer_reviews.text: Well my 9yo DD is severely dyslexic and I read about these filters on a dyslexia Facebook board and I was like "yeah, really????" But I bought them as a trial for my DD. Well we tried a bunch of different colors and found the light aqua was the winner. My DD said the words just "popped", were clearer and appeared to be "magnified" to her. They weren't, but her brain perceived them as larger, so it was MUCH easier for her to read out the letters. I'm still amazed that a little colored piece of plastic works, but it totally does! I'm a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Geojody

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs a way to hold down flat.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s bigger than others I’ve purchased, however, during state testing, my student pointed out that if he doesn’t apply pressure to it or if the book/let is curved, it actually blurs the text and hurts his brain. I wish there was a way he didn’t have to apply full pressure to it, if anyone has tips, I’d appreciate it too. Don’t want to scratch them up. Also blues are good colors for dyslexia. Wish there was a dark blue too but lots of pastels. Green did not work for him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Helps students track when reading
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher and I use this product with students who have difficulty teaching line to line. I like this tracker because it allows students to see the lines that follow. Other tracker so have used isolate only one line of text at a time. While there are benefits to that, I find that it disrupts a student’s fluency- they have to pause, move the strip before continuing on. These strips have a line which focuses students on the current line of text, but also allow them to see the next few lines, and practice moving their eyes to the next line more quickly. These are the best ones I have purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to encourage proper reading habits.
customer_reviews.text: These reading rulers are the perfect size for my tutor students in 4th grade chapter books. They can keep track of where they are but can still read ahead. One student struggles with tracking and letter reversals. I noticed a difference immediately with her pace, stretching words and understanding as a result. Another student struggles with focus and these keep her eyes on the book. I notice her giggling as she is reading when text ahead is funny. Before, she was only able to read on line at a time. The rulers are also sturdy. The color choices are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo size overlays
customer_reviews.text: The size of these overlays are nice and big compared to other highlighted strips I've purchased. I find the little ones don't struggle as much to line up the text with these. There is a line to put under or over the section of text you're reading, but you're not encumbered by trying to fit it in a small highlighted area. My students who use it, say that it helps them to read. I have seen an improvement-it definitely focuses them. I also like that there are a several colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Helps kids focus
customer_reviews.text: Not sure that the colors are doing anything, but it's still good at helping my reluctant reader focus on the line she's supposed to be reading. Good for kids who get overwhelmed at the sight of a whole page of text.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo&Co.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: As a retired teacher who had used overlays such as these with children with reading problems I ordered these for my first grade granddaughter who is experiencing some difficulties. They arrived promptly and were of good quality. We used them together for a few minutes while she chose her favorites. I haven't had the opportunity to work with her personally as she uses them because I sent them home with her and encouraged her to take her favorite color to school, but I have since recommended them to my niece for her third grade daughter to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: These Reading Rulers Rule Reading
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for any age. I think young adults and adults can all relate to when we're reading a book or a reading something on our tablet or phone and we just completely lose where we were. We start to read the same line over again or skip a line or go back a line and it's funny, but also slightly frustrating. This can help both of those groups of people, but children and old people would most likely benefit more as a whole. This is a small item that is convenient and I like that there are different colors to choose from. I would recommend these rulers to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan J (VansonEverything)

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I was a reading teacher for 30 years in the public schools. I had used colored overlays with many of my students before we started talking about Dyslexia. So when my six year old grand daughter started having problems one of my fellow teacher friends reminded me of this. Therefore I looked on amazon and found your product. It is helping her greatly. My only problem is that she prefers the light blue and we have difficulty keeping up with the one that was in the set. She uses it at home, school, and at her special reading classes outside of her school. Her parents are trying to attack from all directions to help her. Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These have worked wonders for my struggling learners! Since they come in multiples, we were able to test them to see which worked the best, and it turns out each of my children needed a different color. So much easier to buy the set. They are a good size for keeping in a book as well. They are sturdier than the sheets or little ruler-type highlighters I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I love how much these worked for my son with dyslexia! He’s 10 and gets easily overwhelmed and anxious with reading. This calmed him AND I noticed a significant improvement with his reading comprehension! The line is also really helpful. My 5 year old doesn’t haven’t any learning struggles, but I let him use these too just to help him stay on track with where he’s at in the book, and to help keep him focused! 100% would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Andes

customer_reviews.title: Helps Keeps Your Spot While Reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my daughter suffers from a traumatic brain injury and dyslexia. She use this color over lay to help her keep her spot while she reads. She likes the idea that it comes different colors so if the paper she is reading is not white she can change the color over lay. She also likes that it is small enough to use as a book mark.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Love these for home and school!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a set of these to trial, before getting a set for school as a tool to help children with special needs! I love these when I am reading and so does my daughter. I have been able to read faster and words appear clearer. This was the boost my 10 year old needed when reading aloud too. I will most absolutely get more to try with students with special needs when we go back to school, or even send home with them to trial for remote learning.
customer_reviews.author: OT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for struggling readers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for some of my literacy intervention students. Some are dyslexic, other are just behind in reading. Each one loves their "reading tracker" and loved the color options they were able to choose from. The blue is a little dark for my liking but one of my students reads great with it! A great buy for anyone who needs help tracking when reading. The cards are durable and make a great bookmark too!
customer_reviews.author: MtnMom5

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Brain Integration Practitioner and a former teacher. I use these with my clients as well as with my students who come in for balancing and tutoring. These help the integrative process with reading go more smoothly and quickly. They can also be used with students with reading issues as well as dyslexia.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Wide colored strips cover more material, but not awkwardly so!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the colored strips are much wider than the other kind I’ve used for years. My students would often have trouble fitting each line of text into the narrow window. These allow you to cover a third to a half of the page at a time which can help promote smoother reading. They are a bit thicker as well, so they seem sturdier. I also liked the array of several different colors that came in my pack since I am a reading tutor and meet with several different students in a day.
customer_reviews.author: lindini

customer_reviews.title: Successful reading tool!
customer_reviews.text: Our son (7), has felt very overwhelmed by too many words on a page, reading a single paragraph causes frustration, stress, and tears. I bought this pack and presented it as a fun surprise, letting him choose a color. He tried it and loved it! He was able to read two chapter books (magic treehouse) in a two week period of time. He likes choosing a different color and the line printed on them is VERY helpful! I highly recommend these reading rulers-there’s nothing better than hearing your child successfully reading and enjoying it! His Dad & I are so grateful! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CHA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the reading rulers for both my son and husband. My husband used them in school and suggested them for our son who has trouble reading. They were not available in stores or at the school. My husband has been inspired to go back to reading books because he has them at his disposal now.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my dyslexia classes/students, and they have really enjoyed them. The kids love the ruler line to keep their place while reading, but it’s wide enough to glance ahead and still have the color overlay. On top of all this, the rulers fit perfectly in their pencil pouch bags in order to travel to and be used in other classes. For whatever reason the lighter blue and rose colors were the most popular (I think because they weren’t as dark as other colors). I had to buy multiple packs in order to get more of those colors... But other than that, it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dyslexic’s & aging Grandma’s!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the reading rulers fot my dyslexic granddaughter, after reading about how they can help to keep the eyes focused as well as reducing the glare from stark white pages. I like the flat thin design and color choices of the 10 pack. I believe they will be easy to keep track of especially if we use them as bookmarks as well. I must admit I have already chosen two of them for my self to use while I read to reduce the strain on my aging eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt strain your eyes reading
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of texbook readings on my studies I just cant keep up with the neverending readingsss. I knew about overlays that dyslexic students use at school. Haven't seen a ruler type overlays before so I thought I'll try it eventhough i am not dyslexic . I tried it and what a big difference in my readings. I can read longer without straining my eyes and my eyes doesnt tire easily. I like the green, yellow, and blue color.
customer_reviews.author: jelloRATE

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Our family really likes these rulers because they work for our dyslexic child and our sensory/ADHD disorder child as well. Also there are a lot of them so we can leave them in multiple places so we are never without. In addition, I use them when I am tired but still want to read. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was unofficially diagnosed with dyslexia as she has signs of it. Her school, teacher and I have all been on board on working with her and improving her reading. She could always do flash cards so much easier than sentences, we couldn't figure out why. With probing questions, research, and watching her carefully we decided to get these. Her teacher at school bought one first and tried them on her and seen great improvement. She told me about them so I decided to purchase some. She loves them, and keeps them in her backpack and uses them both at school and home. It has not only helped her reading but her confidence as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C

customer_reviews.title: Reading Rulers
customer_reviews.text: Good product that could be a helpful tool for struggling readers. I believe that all people learn differently and for those that require more support with reading, translucent plastic overlays in varied colors can improve focus and comprehension. They reduce glare and can aide sustained attention. The company provided quick shipping and easy transaction. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Very Particular Shoe Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for one daughter, distracting for the other
customer_reviews.text: These do the job they're supposed to do and are good quality for a cheaper price than others out there. I love the line at the top that can be flipped so that there's more color above or below the line. One daughter loves the colors she picked. My dyslexic daughter is distracted rather than helped by the ruler. Colored glasses helped, but they are expensive so I hoped these would do the job. Maybe she needs a full page color overlay? A quality product overall.
customer_reviews.author: bec

customer_reviews.title: Colors are darker than shown.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the dark colors. I expected much lighter for my grandson. They are hard for him to see the words and difficult to keep on the page. I gave 3 stars because they are exactly what was represented except the packed colors are darker.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Drury

customer_reviews.title: Makes a BIG difference
customer_reviews.text: The size of the overlay is great for my 6 year old granddaughter. We saw she was having difficulty reading but she hasn’t been tested yet. Working on that. Went ahead and got these for her and she thinks they are magical. Thank you for having these items available to purchase
customer_reviews.author: D Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Dark
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to read through. They are so dark. We did remove the film on one side as directions stated. However, my son complains they are hard to see through still. We have tried out a few of the colors already.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to give one to each of my dyslexic students to use when reading. I write the student’s name in fine-tip Sharpie and instruct the student to keep handy in a classroom folder. The students like to choose their “best” color and use them frequently. The products seems to be holding up well, with few scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Too thick of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I found the plastic is too thick that often times it’s hard for my son to see the words through it. I’ve also noticed that they scratch fairly easily which also makes them harder to see through.
customer_reviews.author: Mkrep2

customer_reviews.title: Help for Visual Stress
customer_reviews.text: These help our readers cope with Visual Stress. For our readers, standard black on white text is perceived as flashing/blinking. The filters reduce the contrast, and allow our readers to read without struggling to see the words. They are a huge help! They are a convenient size for chapter books, and double as a book mark. In our case, the blues and purples work best.
customer_reviews.author: Media

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The 10 colorful rulers, of the perfect size, with a line to help reading, help reading a lot. If the seller offers an all-yellow set, I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help one of my students, and they work great! I love that there are 2 of every color in the pack! I keep one for my student's weekly progress monitoring, and I gave one to her to use with her work in her classes. These have helped her increase her words read per minute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great aid for struggling readers
customer_reviews.text: My son has struggled for several years with reading. Recently he was diagnosed dyslexic. We purchased the reading rules because he does read better if he points at what he's reading. But, being an older elementary student, that is not the way to read anymore. However he will use these. It is much easier for him to focus on and follow what he is reading. He likes the blue color the best. We are very happy with these reading rulers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Students love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have several different colored reading aids for my students and these are always chosen first! They like the line that helps keep their place. I will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: These really help
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has had a really hard time with reading. Her dyslexia is bad. She is 8 and couldn't read or write. Got her these and she came back to tell me how much easier it is to read with these strips It has only been a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: A must have ...love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product..bought for my granddaughter who has dyslexia...she said it was very helpful ...and asked if I would show to her teacher when school starts
customer_reviews.author: catiem

customer_reviews.title: Matte finish does not make text more readable.
customer_reviews.text: These rulers have a protective film on one side when purchased, but even after removing it the filters did not make the text any clearer. They are a soft shade and matte finish. I prefer the glossy, deeper yellow filters because they really make the text pop. I do like the size of these and that they can be used as bookmarks.
customer_reviews.author: Bev M.

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have for struggling readers!
customer_reviews.text: I am a director of an adult learning program and one of my students struggles with dyslexia and these different colors reading rulers were a huge help! The colors helped her with her reading tremendously! Studies show that the different colors tricks the brain. She loved the reading guide to help her stay on track!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Good

customer_reviews.title: Variety is beneficial
customer_reviews.text: A great thing about this was the variety of colors to try. My daughter was able to use the yellow and orange colors best and it helped her see complex plot points on graphs in geometry. It really cleared up the images for her.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptalk

customer_reviews.title: Rulers work wonders
customer_reviews.text: These reading rulers have definitely helped out with my reading. The rulers help tones down the white background so that it makes it easier to read the words. I love that this pack comes with multiple colors. I tried them all out and found two that works best for me, there's a shade of blue and a light green ruler. I also love the line on the ruler. I helps me keep track of where I am on the page. I takes my rulers with me everywhere I go so I’m grateful that they fit in my bag and don’t take up much space at all.
customer_reviews.author: CHALEY BORELAND

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative too overly expensive Irlen stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good size. A bit thicker than Irlen brand, makes it not quite as clear, but that may be a bit picky. I use sideways so I don't like the line that's supposed to help you keep track of a specific sentence. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a middle schooler who has been struggling for years with reading. She is starting to enjoy reading. She went, in one week, wanting to read Junie B Jones to having a desire when finished with her first book to wanting to read Shakespeare. I'm amazed how much this had already helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I use the rulers in my Bible Ministry and so does my Mother. When my Mother (Bible Minister) visits different Bible students; some are in Nursing Facilities and have a difficult time keeping their place reading magazines or the Bible or the Ipad. The Rulers help the students to Keep their place where they are reading. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Treasure

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and several similar products for my daughter (age 7) to see which works best. She's showing signs of a visual processing disorder but not dyslexia. Full testing is a few months away. She did better with guide strips that show one line at a time, as opposed to these. So, strictly based on what effective for her, I'm giving the product three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great reading supports!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are many colors to use. My students who have visual related needs, ADHD, ADD, Autism, and dyslexia have benefited from using these. My beginning readers are loving them as well. The color variations allow students to find the most appropriate color that best suits their needs. These are so great for so many students and even just those who enjoy seeing their pages in color!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guided Reading Rulers (**Provide Visual Reading Support**)
customer_reviews.text: *****5 stars out of 5 stars***** GREAT FOR STUDENTS WITH LEARNING DISABILITIES; RECOMMENDED FOR CHILDREN WITH ADHD AND DYSLEXIA; VISUALLY GUIDES STUDENT'S EYES TO SOLELY FOCUS ON UNDERLINED SENTENCE; HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR STUDENTS WITH DIFFICULTY FOCUSING, CONCENTRATING AND ATTENDING.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Leigh Poquette

customer_reviews.title: Works great for some kids.
customer_reviews.text: Some students who have difficulty tracking and correctly perceiving print benefit from these. I like the variety of colors so that students can experiment to find the best color for them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: A very effective reading aid. It truly helps
customer_reviews.text: It is a very effective tool to help you focus when you read, especially for people with ADHD. The effect is dramatic, focusing on what you read becomes much easier when you use a reading card. I wish, however, that the colors of the cards where as light as possible. Dark colors hide the text you want to read. The cards are very effective as is; making the colors lighter would make them better.
customer_reviews.author: Eitan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!!! My Grandson uses these for reading & it helps him keep up where he is on the page. The blue tone is his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lienhart

customer_reviews.title: Works well when reading on white paper with black ink
customer_reviews.text: Both my 10 and 6yr old use them. The overlays seem to help when the paper is bright white. I noticed when my daughters reading certain novels if the paper isn’t bright white the overlays don’t help as much.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen K.

customer_reviews.title: The blue works
customer_reviews.text: The blue is what works the other colors don't work for me so all the other colors are of no value to me
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Gay McLeod

customer_reviews.title: The more the merrier
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product bc there were 10 rulers in the package. We can keep a ruler in each school book, in each book we are reading at home, in the car...you get the idea. The colored rulers have also really helped with reading. I recommend these to anyone with a child who struggles with reading for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They are great if your little reader has a hard time .
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: Help with reading
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has dyslexia and has been struggling with reading. These reading rulers have helped, she found they made a difference immediately. She has enthusiastically recommended them to classmates who also have dyslexia. The rulers are a handy size that fit inside a book and are easy to keep in a school bag. Give them a try :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S G Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great tool for anyone. My 10 year old is struggling to focus. She is not dyslexic but "ruler" helps her to keep her place and to focus on one line at a time instead of being overwhelmed by the whole page. My 7 year old reads above grade level but uses them to mark her place. This has allowed her speed to increase giving her more confidence. I myself am a college student. As a working mom and an adult learn it is very easy for my mind to wonder but the ruler helps just like it does my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: These rulers are fantastic. A great size and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a family member. We have previously used full-page acetates but found they can get in the way and due to size. These rulers are fantastic. A great size and very durable. Each ruler has a protective coating that peels off. I didn't notice that at first as they are so clear with it. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool for dyslexic students!
customer_reviews.text: These reading windows are a fantastic tool for my students in literacy intervention. The variety of colors is wonderful as each student can choose the color and shade that works well for them. I highly recommend this product for students who struggle with reading.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Colorful rulers
customer_reviews.text: The only issue that I have is that the box had already been opened when I received the item. If I didn’t need these Easy Reading Rulers for a student with dyslexia Monday morning for school, I would surely return them. I’m quite annoyed that it was shipped opened!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: All The colors Are too dark, we can’t see the letters.
customer_reviews.author: haze

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, A Little Lengthy
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected with this pack. I teach 5th grade and have multiple students who are dyslexic. One of the students I gave one to, to use as he needed. He doesn't like using it because it is really long, especially when reading a book which is when he usually needs it. But other than that everything was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: It felt durable.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. I expect to hear that one color is helpful. It felt durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I teach middle school bilingual students and a few were struggling with reading. I tried the rulers on an assignment and the students found them to be very helpful. It help them track and focus on small parts versus being distracted by the whole page of words. They tend to favor the blue overlay.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but some improvement is needed
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very good, card thickness is near perfect. However ... 1. Material from cards are made is scratching very easy 2. Transparency should be more clear-the cards are just too dull, I'm not meassured of course, but looks them are stopping at least half of the light passing through them.
customer_reviews.author: ZEEV FAINBERG

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. It's great for those who suffer eye fatigue when reading.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for 7 year old dyslexic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 years old and has dyslexia. We recently purchased these after research by her reading tutor. The blue and purple seem to help her most with staying focused on the line and letters she is reading. They arrived in great time and in nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great reading tool!
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my 4th and 5th graders. They help them to focus on the right line and word when they are reading. The brain is attracted to colors, so my students choose the one that works best for them.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for my dyslexic 10 year old to read books or anything on white paper.
customer_reviews.author: ad2576

customer_reviews.title: Reading Strips a great value and terrific product
customer_reviews.text: I work with students with reading difficulties, and this is a useful tool to help them keep track of lines and paragraphs easily, and the color overlay helps reduce visual strain. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: V. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Draws attention to your reading
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my daughter during our read aloud times. Before, she didn't follow along; when I use the ruler, she does. I also use them when I do my college textbook reading. Neither of us has dylexia, but enjoy the extra focus and color these bring to our reading.
customer_reviews.author: lsenti

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and cover the half page stories of beginning books nicely
customer_reviews.author: helen brooks

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for students of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I am both a parent and teacher of kids struggling with dyslexia. My elementary aged son and high school aged student both found the Coloured Overlays extremely helpful. They were better able to stay focused and track the words/lines while reading.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Work, and very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Best dyslexia strips, and I have tried a few. These are the best shape.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The variety of colors is helpful as we didn't know which color would work best for my daughter who has ADD. She loves using them because she can tell a difference in her reading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tool
customer_reviews.text: For my 9 year old son, recently diagnosed with dyslexia, this has been an amazing tool! Definitely helps him focus better when reading books.
customer_reviews.author: BSizemore

customer_reviews.title: Work well and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My Son who has a slow reading tendency loves them!!

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Strategy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and have students I'm concerned about with their fluency. The ruler made a big difference with 2 of those students. I'm pleased this strategy worked for them and their confidence is growing!
customer_reviews.author: Kid at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Love there are colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have dyslexia. So the rulers are very helpful. I even use one at work. We have both found these to be very helpful. I love they come with so many colors too. It allows you to use what best works for you and your child.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Meldrum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were bigger in size but are easy to use and use as a book marker for reading. Good range of colors to work through for best option for color that works for clarity. Daughter was able to choose which one worked best for her quickly.
customer_reviews.author: clexcen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Text was easily able to be read with all colors, the line helped the students focus one sentence at a time rather than getting distracted by everything. Would buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, quality product. These really do help some students with dyslexia. I have used them successfully in my classroom (I'm now retired) and currently in my tutoring. Now I have another teacher interested in them!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Students like it
customer_reviews.text: My students who use it say it helps! They have dyslexia and the other is color blingmd.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have dyslexia since I was a kid. I love reading and it has always been difficult for me. These reading rules are amazing and helped me so much! It makes it easier to read and more enjoyable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son is just at the age wneee he wants to learn to read and these help a ton! Keeps him focus and on track with the words. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tycarrian Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved that these came in different colors for an excellent price. I’ve also been using them for school and they help me focus more on my text books and stumble less.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: i do lots of data entry at work.. it helps me keep my place :)

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: These reading rulers are the perfect size. They are large enough to cover what the student is reading but small enough to just fit in the textbook discreetly. My high school students are actually willing to use them.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Dyslexia
customer_reviews.text: Helps my Granddaughter, she says the letters stop moving around. This is the third set I have gotten her. She has them at home, school, and the vehicle. I have a set for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommending
customer_reviews.text: I found them really helpful for my daughter but also for myself. It help to focus on the word and line you actually read and stop your mind from jumping to other lines. Fully recommending, thank you

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Great reading assistant.
customer_reviews.text: Rulers are great. It helps my grandson to stay on track while reading. Prior to this, he'd get frustrated when he lost his place. Great product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kelli H.

product_meta.title: Luigi's 10 x Dyslexia Reading Strips with Coloured Overlays. Reading Tracking Rulers for Dyslexia Irlens, ADHD and Visual Stress
product_meta.description:
How can SB-Education reading rulers help you?

- Gentle color tints are designed to alleviate eye strain, making reading faster and more comfortable.

- A choice of colors to try out allow you to find what works best for you.

- A helpful reading line helps increase focus on individual words and sentences and helps improves reading speed. 

Thanks for checking us out. We feel passionate about our products and hope they help to enjoy reading and learning for the lifetime.
feature_bullets: ✅ 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗜𝗘𝗥 - The gentle tinted colour and narrow narrow strip just above the reading line help to reduce visual stress, allowing you to read easier and more comfortably than ever before.

💚🔴🔵💛 𝟭𝟬 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗥𝗦 - This pack contains 10 colors so you can quickly find out which colour benefits you the most. We find that 40% of readers prefer the light blue, but we're all different so make sure to test them all after purchase. (Aqua, Sky, Yellow, Grass, Celery, Jade, Orange, Purple, Pink, Magenta)

✅ 𝗗𝗬𝗦𝗟𝗘𝗫𝗜𝗔 𝗧𝗢𝗢𝗟𝗦, 𝗔𝗗𝗛𝗗 & 𝗜𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗡𝗦 𝗦𝗬𝗡𝗗𝗥𝗢𝗠𝗘 𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗟𝗬 - The coloured tint in the rulers help to reduce visual stress. The reading line helps to provide focus and clarity on each line. Reading rulers are a common first step in aiding Dyslexic children and adults enjoy their reading.
✅ 𝗦𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗜𝗔𝗟 𝗘𝗗𝗨𝗖𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗣𝗟𝗜𝗘𝗦 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗦 - Toddler to adult. School, college, home or office use.

📏 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗠 𝗢𝗡 𝗘𝗔𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗜𝗣 - Each of the rulers is shipped with a layer of protective film on the reading side. It's difficult to see at first glance, remember to remove it for optimum performance!
